attributes.additional_details: With us all being on lockdown a lot of us couldn’t attend funerals of family and friends during this time with them dying from covid-19 or other illnesses. They should be remembered
attributes.background: When this Covid-19 is all over and life starts to get back to normal we should have a Remembrance Day for all those lives lost due to this virus & for all those who couldn’t attend funerals of family & Friends

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to support a remembrance day. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
